dt: {bc}a member of a people of northern Scandinavia, Finland, and the Kola Peninsula of northern Russia who are traditionally fishermen, nomadic herders of caribou, and hunters of sea mammals
{bc}any or all of the closely related Finno-Ugric languages of the Sami people

et: of Sami origin; akin to North Sami {it}sápmi{/it}, genitive {it}sámi{/it} the Sami homeland, language, or way of life
shortdef: a member of a people of northern Scandinavia, Finland, and the Kola Peninsula of northern Russia who are traditionally fishermen, nomadic herders of caribou, and hunters of sea mammals
any or all of the closely related Finno-Ugric languages of the Sami people
